scripts.sd:fe: npm run wait-for-docker && cd frontend && npm run sd:fe
scripts.sd:be:server: npm run wait-for-docker && cd backend && npm run sd:server
scripts.sd:be:handler: npm run wait-for-docker && cd backend && npm run sd:handler
scripts.fill-it: npm i && npm i --prefix frontend && npm i --prefix backend
scripts.sd: concurrently -n docker,frontend,server,eventHandler -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run sd:be:docker" "npm run sd:fe" " npm run sd:be:server" "npm run sd:be:handler"
